title: Ip Store Glitch!!
body:
So this glitch happened to me around 5-8 times this month.It's not a major glitch or whatsoever but i can get really annoying since the only way you can fix it is to relog.
I guess this picture will tell the story 
I have been buying new runes to experiment with and this happens alot.
AGAIN this is not a major glitch whatsoever,it's just really annoying because you have to relog just to fix it.

Rito pls!


Been buying cooldown reduction gylphs for {{champion:77}}  and {{champion:64}}  
:D 


Now if you look closely at my ip,I have 869 ip which is enough to buy one cooldown reduction gylph but when I try to purchase one it says I only have 492 ip.


UPDATE:
The relogging in fix doesn't work anymore.I thought relogging in would fix it AGAIN because the few other times when this glitch happened,I relogged and it fixed itself but this time it did not fix any glitch whatsoever.
http://imageshack.com/a/img538/5213/1HJ49w.jpg






I will keep updating this post till I am able to find a way to fix it.

replies.body:
The same is happening to a lot of people. I've started a thread here: 
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/FKoAQK2M-not-enough-ip-bug
It's getting really annoying since I need one more cooldown reduction gylph to complete my udyr runes.
Riot needs to fix their outdated store.

LoL, Thats funny KingX, you say they arent looking into it, well one guy has a email from them, Riot even commented in this thread, i myself have looked into this and riot and pretty set on fixing it, so why dosent everyone stop complaining to riot about problems and let them do what they have planned for the game as they do a lot for us players and its sad to see 70% of the community complaining to riot about the smallest things ever. <3 riot

Uh im sorry but I don't recall saying that they did nothing concering the problem but instead I said I hope they look into it.Also I don't think pointing out glitches is considered complaining rather it's actually helping by pointing out the glitches so that the staff would notice and fix it.I do not think that glitches are "planned" like you said.So please read my thread carefully before you start saying things about my post.

lol i didn't say glitches were planned so please read my comment before you post, they are trying to get things out to us and they have to stop cause people complain over small things which then leads people to complain about how long they take to release stuff
I didn't complain,I just let rito know that a glitch like that is out there lol.

Hey guys,

Sorry about this. There appears to be an issue on our end where your account's true IP total isn't synching up with the store, meaning it isn't available for use in purchases.

We've got dudes looking at this right now so keep an eye on this thread for updates:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/FKoAQK2M-not-enough-ip-bug?comment=0027

This glitch is happening to me as well, I am meant to have 3475 ip but instead i have 2849 ip and when I play games the ip I'm supposed to have goes up. But apparently in the store I still have 2849 IP ):0 Ive sent riot an email and they know about it, I think its getting fixed soon...hopefully
Hopefully,it's frustrating when you can't buy something that you've been wanting to get
Bump so hopefully rito will take note of this glitch if they have not yet.
Anybody know a fix for this?
At the moment there is no fix for it and rito has no updates about looking into the problem.
